(Heart Disease & Diabetes Prediction)

ğŸ“Œ Project Overview

The Health Disease Prediction System is a machine learningâ€“based project designed to predict the risk of Heart Disease and Diabetes using patient health parameters.
This project demonstrates the complete data mining and machine learning workflow, from data preprocessing to model training and prediction.

ğŸ¯ Objectives

Predict Heart Disease based on clinical attributes

Predict Diabetes using medical indicators

Apply data preprocessing, EDA, and ML models

Store trained models for reuse

Build a scalable structure for multi-disease prediction
